# NSColor.ColorType.componentBased

**Case**

Colors that include floating-point color components and a color space.

## Declaration

```swift
case componentBased
```

## Discussion

Examples of this type are RGB, CMYK, and HSB colors. Before acessing components that are specific to one colorspace, such as the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/redComponent] of an RGB color, call [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/usingColorSpace(_:)].

## Color Types

- **NSColor.ColorType.pattern**: Colors that include an image to be used as a pattern.
- **NSColor.ColorType.catalog**: Colors that are retrieved from an asset catalog.
